name: Happy Hour (itch)
description:
Happy Hour is a PC game in which you create and manage a bar. On opening day, the money is tight, but it's up to you to transform your modest bar into a fancy successful establishment with a great reputation.

Please note that the development is currently on hold.

This is the first game I have ever done. It is not entirely finished, but due to personal reasons, I had to put the development on hold. It is still currently fully playable and I hope you have fun with it.

If you're curious and want to know more about the development process, feel free to read its Post-Mortem.

Thanks!

Nicolas M.
